author: mattmerola
title: I enjoy the sets with the pullback motors.
review: For me these sets have been a nice change of pace compared to a mega-build like the MKII.  This is the first one I bought (quad bike as well) and I was worried the motor would be weak but it did not disappoint.  The green desert racer rips compared to the quad bike, but I like them both.   Anyways, quick simple build, I think it looks cooler without the decals as I usually do, and it can take a beating.  You can set up some cool jumps and stuff and it can take quite a beating with only needing a minor adjustment now and then. For 20 bucks extreme playability in my opinion.  We will see how many hundreds of pulls these motors were built for haha.
